channel.title: Help! Server problems
channel.description:
Well I haven't played this game yet, because every time I try to, I get something like "Error connecting to server. Must be down." I've tried several different servers, even tried making one of my own.
Could someone please help me? I'm getting to the point of frustration.

item.title: Help! Server problems
item.dc:creator: @wrath0fgufix wrath0fgufix
item.description:
@wrath0fgufix wrote:

well to see if a server is online go to “moparisthebest.com” then when the little screen pops up th`at sais run or cancle click cancle

then there is the buttons of click here to go to the forums. and
click here to go to the serverstatus page.

click on serverstatuspage find one that is not a client(unless you wanna download a client) and use the server ip and port then play.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Server problems
item.dc:creator: @MyNameIsDan MyNameIsDan
item.description:
@MyNameIsDan wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:5, topic:242048”]The server is down, you haven’t portforwarded, set classpaths, etc…it could be many things.

Also you didn’t have to make the asshole comment to Chaos, he can atleast get on a server.[/quote]

Asshole comment? I was simply asking. Reason for that is because I play a game where lots of peoples’ first languages aren’t English. I just didn’t think the question was that hard to understand. >.< But yeah, sorry about that. Sometimes I come off a bit cruel.

Whatever though…I’ll try more servers I guess. I don’t know how the hell to portforward or set classpaths…so this probably isn’t the game for me.

And this game is very misleading…I was under the impression that I could just click “start server” and log on and play. Because it’s basically saying when you start your server “Server started, please now log in and have fun” o.O

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Server problems
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The server is down, you haven’t portforwarded, set classpaths, etc…it could be many things.

Also you didn’t have to make the asshole comment to Chaos, he can atleast get on a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Server problems
item.dc:creator: @Corrupted_Chaos Corrupted_Chaos
item.description:
@Corrupted_Chaos wrote:

First, yes I understand english. You’ve answered your own question the servers are down, keep in mind you need a certain client to use some servers.

It will be locked becasue it’s for programming servers, not these type questions.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Server problems
item.dc:creator: @MyNameIsDan MyNameIsDan
item.description:
@MyNameIsDan wrote:

Let me try to put it clearer…

Whenever I try to log in, I put in a username and password, I click “log in”, and EVERY SINGLE TIME, I get “Error connecting to server. Must be down.” What’s so hard to understand? Is English not your first language?

I’ve tried loads of different servers, there’s no way all of them could be down…and why would this topic be locked? >.< This is the topic to ask questions and request help, right? I’m asking a question, and I request help. >.<

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Server problems
item.dc:creator: @Corrupted_Chaos Corrupted_Chaos
item.description:
@Corrupted_Chaos wrote:

Means the server isn’t online right now. I’m not sure what you’re asking? I’m pretty sure this topic will be locked though.

Read full topic
